credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Apollo New York 125th Street Harlem
description: Black poster. In top half, a high-contrast street scene of Harlem in pink, orange and purple, with the marquee of the Apollo Theater at left. Along right side of poster, large blue text reads "HARLEM" with smaller text, in pink, which reads "New York 125th Street."
name: Poster
